title: Erratum to: Culture of reconstructed epidermis in a defined medium at 33° C shows a delayed epidermal maturation, prolonged lifespan and improved stratum corneum (By Susan Gibbs, Jana Vicanová, Joke Bouwstra, Dingena Valstar, Johanna Kempenaar, Maria Ponec, In: Arch Dermatol Res (1997) 289 : 585–595)
